item.description:
Lunch is still on! The walk is cancelled due to the rain.

Meet 12:30 pm at TGI Fridays in Milford.
Located at 240 Fortune Blvd in the same plaza as Staples & Bed Bath & Beyond.
Ask for Jacki or the meetup group.


Walk the scenic Milford Bike Trail then enjoy lunch at TGI Fridays.

Meet at the Dilla Street Parking lot for an hour walk. After the walk we'll head over to TGI Fridays for lunch around 12:30/12:45 pm.

When you RSVP please note in the comments if you will be doing both the walk and lunch or one or the other.

If it rains or snows it will be cancelled, but lunch will still be on. Please check the site and/or your email for updated information the morning of the event.

For directions: http://www.milford.ma...
item.name: Walk and Lunch in Milford
